title: Unity RPG
description: Embark on an epic Unity RPG adventure, battling monsters and bosses as 3 distinct characters, each with unique combat styles and abilities. Customize your heroes through a skill tree and gear up with equipment from specialized shops.

title: Pong
description: A recreation of the game Pong on a DE10 Standard FPGA Development Board using the built in LCD and 7-segment displays for output and a pair of GPIO analog dials to control the paddles.
